SubSections.Title: Assassination

Parts: You hit a combatant with advantage.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T3d6.

SubSections.Title: Assassination (Evolved)

Parts: You hit a combatant with advantage.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T4d6.

SubSections.Title: Ambush

Parts: You make an attack against a surprised combatant.

SubSections.Content: The success level of the attack is increased by 1 against it.

SubSections.Title: Area
SubSections.Content: The limit is removed.

SubSections.Title: Safe
SubSections.Content: The success level is increased by 2 instead.

SubSections.Title: Unexpected Angle
SubSections.Content: You use a basic attack ability. You become focused 2 for the attack.

SubSections.Title: Hyperfocus
SubSections.Content: You become focused 4 instead.

SubSections.Title: Between Realities
SubSections.Content: You become protected 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Backstab

Parts: You attack a combatant from the opposite direction that you last hit it within 1 turn.

SubSections.Content: Against the combatant, the attack gains advantage and its damage is increased by T1d6.

SubSections.Title: Pattern
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Shadowstab
SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T3d6 instead.

SubSections.Title: Execute
SubSections.Content: If it's dying or its health is below T5 after the attack, it dies.

SubSections.Title: Analyze
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. After 2 rounds, your next attack against it gains advantage against it and its damage is increased by T3d8 against it.

SubSections.Title: Pattern
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Quick Analysis
SubSections.Content: Using this ability against a combatant that you've already used it against does not count towards any limit or cooldown.

SubSections.Title: Defensive
SubSections.Content: After hitting a combatant with an attack affected by this ability, its next hit against you misses instead.

SubSections.Title: Headshot

Parts: You crit a basic attack ability.

SubSections.Content: You reroll all damage dice twice instead of once and use the sum.

SubSections.Title: Expert
SubSections.Content: The limit is removed.

SubSections.Title: Explode
SubSections.Content: All damage dice explode.

SubSections.Title: Rush
SubSections.Content: Your speed is doubled for 1 turn.

SubSections.Title: Invisible
SubSections.Content: You become hidden for 1 turn.

SubSections.Title: Rage
SubSections.Content: You enter a rage until you use another quick action to end it. While raging, you become revealed, but your power is increased by T1, or by T2 while injured, or by T4 while dying.

SubSections.Title: Rage (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: You enter a rage until you use another quick action to end it. While raging, you become revealed, but your power is increased by T2, or by T5 while injured, or by T10 while dying.

SubSections.Title: Undying
SubSections.Content: You fall to 1 health instead. For 1 long round, you cannot fall below 1 health.

SubSections.Title: Eternal
SubSections.Content: The duration is increased to 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Battle Hardened
SubSections.Content: At the end of the duration, you gain T15 shield.

SubSections.Title: Unbreakable
SubSections.Content: For the duration, you gain immunity to all conditions of your choice and lose all existing conditions of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Unyielding Willpower
SubSections.Content: You become resilient 2 while injured, or resilient 5 while dying.

SubSections.Title: Free Will
SubSections.Content: While dying, the severity of all conditions of your choice that you have is reduced by 1.

SubSections.Title: Unstoppable
SubSections.Content: While dying, you become anchored and immune to grappled.

SubSections.Title: Burning Fury
SubSections.Content: You become aflame for 1 round. While aflame in this way, the damage of all of your attacks is increased by T1d4 (thermal), or T1d6 while injured, or T1d8 while dying.

SubSections.Title: Strong Fire
SubSections.Content: You become aflame 2 instead. The number of dice is increased to 2.

SubSections.Title: Pyromaniac
SubSections.Content: While dying, using it does not count towards its limit.

SubSections.Title: Drag Into Hell
SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T3d10. After the attack, you are reduced to 0 health.

SubSections.Title: Hellbringer
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Duel
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant. Until you use this ability again, your crit range is increased by 1 against it, your accuracy is increased by 2 against it, and its accuracy is decreased by 2 against you.

SubSections.Title: Duel (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant. Until you use this ability again, your crit range is increased by 2 against it, your accuracy is increased by 4 against it, its crit range is decreased by 2 against you, and its accuracy is decreased by 4 against you.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Parry
SubSections.Content: The attack misses you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Consistency
SubSections.Content: If the attack would have missed anyways, the limit or cooldown is reset.

SubSections.Title: Quick Counter

Parts: After you are missed by a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic attack ability against it.

SubSections.Title: Unchained
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Elegant
SubSections.Content: On a hit, you regain the quick action.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Block
SubSections.Content: The attack gains disadvantage against you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Inverse
SubSections.Content: All advantages the attack has against you turn into disadvantages against you.

SubSections.Title: Thorned
SubSections.Content: The attacker takes T2 damage (piercing, slashing).

SubSections.Title: Steel
SubSections.Content: The damage is increased to T4.

SubSections.Title: Nasty
SubSections.Content: The attacker gains 2 bleeding stacks.

SubSections.Title: Poisoned
SubSections.Content: The attacker becomes poisoned for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Mark
SubSections.Content: You mark a combatant until you use this ability again. Your damage is increased by T2 against the marked target.

SubSections.Title: Mark (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: You mark a combatant until you use this ability again. Your damage is increased by T1d8 against the marked target.

SubSections.Title: Find Weakness
SubSections.Content: You find a weakness against it, which stacks up to a maximum of 11. For every 3 weaknesses you find against a combatant, you come up with a counter. For each counter, your accuracy is increased by 2 against it and your power is increased by T2 against it. At maximum stacks, the effects of each counter are doubled.

SubSections.Title: Fast Eye
SubSections.Content: You come up with a counter for every 2 weaknesses instead.

SubSections.Title: Vital
SubSections.Content: Each counter increases your crit range by 1 against it.

SubSections.Title: Pierce Heel
SubSections.Content: The attack bypasses shield and partial cover, as well as damage reduction, weakness, resistance and immunity.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Pierce Shield
SubSections.Content: All hit combatants lose T10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Pierce Defense
SubSections.Content: All hit combatants become revealed and vulnerable for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Heighten Senses
SubSections.Content: You become keen 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Stacking
SubSections.Content: For the duration, the number of stacks you apply is doubled.

SubSections.Title: Power
SubSections.Content: You become strengthened 2 for the duration.

SubSections.Title: Exploit Situation

Parts: Before you attack a combatant that is slowed, prone, or grappled.

SubSections.Content: For 1 turn, the damage of your attacks is increased by T1d6 against it.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Perfect
SubSections.Content: If the combatant is slowed, prone, and grappled, and it received all conditions from you, its limit or cooldown is reset.

SubSections.Title: Blindspot
SubSections.Content: For the duration, your accuracy is increased by 2 against it, and your crit range is increased by 1 against it.

SubSections.Title: Most Loyal
SubSections.Content: You summon from any category.

SubSections.Title: Most Loyal (Evolved)

Parts: Combat starts, or this ability wasn't active within 3 rounds.

SubSections.Content: You summon from any category.

SubSections.Title: Share Pain
SubSections.Content: Choose 2 willing combatants within range. Each combatant takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage, and reduces the damage you take by the same amount.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Kamikaze
SubSections.Content: Choose any number of them instead.

SubSections.Title: Supreme General
SubSections.Content: While you control combatants with a combined upkeep of at least 3, you and all controlled combatants become protected.

SubSections.Title: Blind Faith
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants become zealous.

SubSections.Title: Medical Aid
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants become shielded.

SubSections.Title: Without Hesitation
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants become strengthened.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Order
SubSections.Content: You and all controlled combatants become hastened.

SubSections.Title: Promotion
SubSections.Content: Choose a controlled summon that has been on the battlefield for at least 3 rounds with an importance below 3. Its importance and upkeep are increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Limitless
SubSections.Content: The limit is removed.

SubSections.Title: Restore
SubSections.Content: Its health is restored.

SubSections.Title: Increased Growth
SubSections.Content: The limit is ignored for the combatant. After 3 rounds, the max resets for the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Yin
SubSections.Content: You gain T1 shield if you hit at least 1 attack since 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Yang
SubSections.Content: You lose all shield. The damage is increased by [shield lost].

SubSections.Title: Yin
SubSections.Content: You gain T2 shield per attack hit within 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Yang
SubSections.Content: You lose a number of shield of your choice. The damage is increased by [shield lost].

SubSections.Title: Force Absorption
SubSections.Content: You regain all shield lost from the attack.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Quick Recovery
SubSections.Content: You gain shield equal to [lost health -/ 2].

SubSections.Title: Meditate
SubSections.Content: You gain T10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Fortify
SubSections.Content: You become fortified for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Clear Mind
SubSections.Content: You lose all simple unstackable conditions of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Life Energy
SubSections.Content: You reserve up to T10 health. You gain additional [reserved health] shield.

SubSections.Title: Yin
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within reach to remove either collapsed, confused, freezing, grappled, paralyzed, revealed, or weakened from it. The combatant gains immunity to the condition for 1 long round.

SubSections.Title: Yang

Parts: After you hit an attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes either collapsed, confused, freezing, grappled, paralyzed, revealed, or weakened for 1 long round.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limits.

SubSections.Title: Duration
SubSections.Content: The durations are increased to 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Absorb Shield
SubSections.Content: You gain [shield it lost from the attack -/ 2] shield.

SubSections.Title: Barrage
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Sundering
SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes sundered 2 against the attack.

SubSections.Title: Overflow
SubSections.Content: Choose an attack ability. After 2 rounds, the next time you use the ability it overflows. If an ability overflows, its damage is increased by T3d8, any number of targets are doubled, and any radius, length, and width are increased by half rounded down.

SubSections.Title: Overflow (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: Choose an attack ability. After 2 rounds, the next time you use the ability it overflows. If an ability overflows, its damage is increased by T3d8, any number of targets are doubled, and any radius, length, and width are increased by half rounded down.

SubSections.Title: Cataclysm
SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T3d8.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Growing
SubSections.Content: For each round since combat start you gain 1 growth stack up to a maximum of 8. The damage is increased by [stacks]d8 instead.

SubSections.Title: Echo
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, the combatant receives [damage taken -/ 2] damage (metabolism).

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Full
SubSections.Content: The combatant receives [damage taken] damage instead.

SubSections.Title: Arcane Barrier
SubSections.Content: You summon an arcane barrier covering yourself. You cannot be hit until the barrier is destroyed.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Self Repair
SubSections.Content: The cost is removed. You can use this at the start of combat.

SubSections.Title: Seeds Of Chaos
SubSections.Content: It gains 1 harvest stack. At the end of its turns, it gains 1 additional stack up to a maximum of 6. If a combatant with stacks dies, it loses all stacks, but you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Harvest
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant with harvest stacks from you. It becomes revealed, paralyzed, and vulnerable for 1 round with a severity of [stacks -/ 2]. It loses all stacks.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Duration
SubSections.Content: The duration is increased by [stacks -/ 2].

SubSections.Title: Sacrifice
SubSections.Content: You reserve T8 health. The damage is increased by [health reserved].

SubSections.Title: Sacrifice (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: You reserve a number of health of your choice. The damage is increased by [health reserved].

SubSections.Title: Vitality Recovery
SubSections.Content: You regain T5 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Forbidden Rite
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The severity is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Perfected
SubSections.Content: You reserve T15 health instead. The severity is increased by 2 instead.

SubSections.Title: Grand Binding Ritual
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The combatant becomes grappled 2. While grappled in this way, it becomes poisoned, prone, and soulbound.

SubSections.Title: Multi
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After 3 rounds, the limit is reset.

SubSections.Title: Absorb Vitality
SubSections.Content: You regain [its max health -/ 10] reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Continuous
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Soul Link
SubSections.Content: You reserve T5 health. The accuracy of your attacks is increased by 1 against it, and whenever you hit it, you regain T1 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Impede
SubSections.Content: The accuracy is increased by 3 instead.

SubSections.Title: Resourceful
SubSections.Content: You regain T2 reserved health instead.

SubSections.Title: Reverse Die
SubSections.Content: You invert the natural result (by subtracting it from 21).

SubSections.Title: Reverse Die (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: You invert the natural result (by subtracting it from 21).

SubSections.Title: Glitch
SubSections.Content: You reduce the success level by 1 against you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Mirror
SubSections.Content: The attack also targets the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Undo Damage Bug
SubSections.Content: If reducing the success level causes the attack to miss, you gain T5 shield.

SubSections.Title: Quick Replace
SubSections.Content: You swap location (via teleportation) with a willing combatant within range that is not being attacked. The attack targets that combatant instead of you.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Temporary
SubSections.Content: You swap back to your original position.

SubSections.Title: Inverse Effects

Parts: You gain a simple condition with an inverse for a duration.

SubSections.Content: You gain its inverse instead for the same duration.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Reflect
SubSections.Content: Choose the attacker or a willing combatant within range. The chosen combatant either gains the condition or its inverse for the duration.

SubSections.Title: Cheat

Parts: After a combatant within range makes an attack.

SubSections.Content: You either increase or decrease the natural result by 2.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Improved
SubSections.Content: The natural result is increased or decreased by 4 instead.

SubSections.Title: Trap Card

Parts: Before a combatant within range makes an attack.

SubSections.Content: All advantages count as disadvantages and all disadvantages count as advantages instead.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Perfect Trap
SubSections.Content: You either remove all advantages or disadvantages.

SubSections.Title: Torment
SubSections.Content: Your damage is increased by T2 against combatants that have a condition from you.

SubSections.Title: Torment (Evolved)
SubSections.Content: Your damage is increased by T1d8 against combatants that have a condition from you.

SubSections.Title: Forbidden Curse

Parts: You apply a simple condition to a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The severity is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Eternal
SubSections.Content: If the condition has a duration, the duration is doubled.

SubSections.Title: Sap

Parts: You apply a a simple condition with an inverse for a duration.

SubSections.Content: You gain its inverse for the same duration.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After the duration, you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Hexbond
SubSections.Content: You gain the condition instead of its inverse.

SubSections.Title: Curse Mirror

Parts: You gain a simple condition from another combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant also gains the condition until you lose it.

SubSections.Title: Double
SubSections.Content: The limit is replaced.

SubSections.Title: Recharge
SubSections.Content: After you lose it, you regain 1 use.

SubSections.Title: Hexbond
SubSections.Content: If the condition has an inverse, you gain its inverse instead.

SubSections.Title: Redirect Pain
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within range. The combatant takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage. You take no damage.

SubSections.Title: Cooldown
SubSections.Content: The cooldown replaces the limit.

SubSections.Title: Reflect Pain
SubSections.Content: The attacker takes [damage taken -/ 2] damage.
